name: Sekiro™: Shadows Die Twice
description: In Sekiro™: Shadows Die Twice you are the 'one-armed wolf', a disgraced and disfigured warrior rescued from the brink of death.

name: DARK SOULS™: REMASTERED
description: DARK SOULS™: REMASTERED is a dark fantasy universe, tense dungeon crawling, fearsome enemy encounters and unique online interactions.

name: DARK SOULS™ II: Scholar of the First Sin
description: DARK SOULS™ II: Scholar of the First Sin brings the franchise’s renowned obscurity & gripping gameplay to a new level.

name: DARK SOULS™ III
description: DARK SOULS™ III continues to push the boundaries with the latest, ambitious chapter in the critically-acclaimed and genre-defining series.

name: Strange Horticulture
description: Strange Horticulture is an occult puzzle game in which you play as the proprietor of a local plant store.

name: Papers, Please
description: In Papers, Please your job as immigration inspector is to control the flow of people entering the Arstotzkan side of Grestin from Kolechia.

name: Hollow Knight
description: Hollow Knight is an epic action adventure through a vast ruined kingdom of insects and heroes.

name: NARUTO: Ultimate Ninja STORM
description: NARUTO: Ultimate Ninja STORM allows players to battle in full 3D across massive environments.

name: NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja STORM 2
description: NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja STORM 2 is a tour de force of Naruto thrills and spills.

name: Darksiders Warmastered Edition
description: Darksiders Warmastered Edition is about evil forces trying to bring the end of the world.

name: Coloring Game 2
description: Coloring Game 2 is a sequel of the existing color-by-number game which so many users have liked.

name: Escape Simulator
description: Escape Simulator is about exploring a set of highly interactive escape rooms.

name: The House of Da Vinci
description: The House of Da Vinci, a must-try 3D puzzle adventure game.

name: Return of the Obra Dinn
description: Return of the Obra Dinn is a first-person mystery adventure based on exploration and logical deduction.

name: Montaro
description: Montaro is a DOGE.

name: We Were Here
description: We Were Here is the free pilot episode in a series of cooperative standalone puzzle adventures.

name: LoveChoice
description: LoveChoice is a decision-based AVG.

name: Sudocats
description: Sudoku for cat people.

name: Cookie Clicker
description: Cookie Clicker is a game about making an absurd amount of cookies.

name: Cuphead
description: Cuphead is a classic run and gun action game heavily focused on boss battles.

name: Darkest Dungeon®
description: Darkest Dungeon is a challenging gothic roguelike turn-based RPG about the psychological stresses of adventuring.

name: Dead Cells
description: Dead Cells is a rogue-lite, metroidvania inspired, action-platformer.

name: Castle Crashers®
description: Castle Crashers® is about hacking, slashing, and smashing your way to victory in this award winning 2D arcade adventure from The Behemoth!

name: Undertale
description: Undertale, the RPG game where you don't have to destroy anyone.

name: Squad
description: Squad is a tactical FPS that provides authentic combat experiences through teamwork, constant communication, and realistic gameplay.
